Me and my students have made a bunch of flipbooks, and we are pretty excited that they are being made out it the world as well!  The {flipbookr} package or its predicesor code base

- [The Tidyverse for Archaeologists, A Guide for Beginners, Japan, Ben Marwick, May 2020](https://benmarwick.github.io/tidyverse-for-archaeology/tidyverse-for-archaeology.html){target=_blank}

- [Dr Rhian Davies (Jumping Rivers): 'Data Viz for better' Presenting at the Royal Statistical Society Merseyside](https://trianglegirl.github.io/presentations/2020-07-01-data-viz-for-better/2020-05-12-florence-and-data-viz.html#1){target=_blank}

- [Data Visualization with R and ggplot2 Jessica Minnier, PhD & Meike Niederhausen, PhD OCTRI Biostatistics, Epidemiology, Research & Design (BERD) Workshop](https://jminnier-berd-r-courses.netlify.app/04-ggplot/04_ggplot_slides.html#1){target=_blank}

- [Tidy Geospatial Networks in R Introducing the sfnetworks package Lucas van der Meer, Lorena Abad, Andrea Gilardi, Robin Lovelace 2020-06-16 for e-Rum2020 statellite event: Hackathon on Spatial Networks](https://sfnetworks.github.io/sfnetworks-webinar/slides#1){target=_blank}

- [The Hirschey Lab](https://github.com/matthewhirschey/tidybiology-meetup/blob/7d0a51fb65e25615ad65dae49a92980a5b382096/2020_02/code/prism_plot_flipbook.Rmd){target=_blank} - The Hirschey Lab studies different aspects of metabolic control, mitochondrial signaling, and cellular processes regulating human health and disease

- [OCTRI Biostatistics, Epidemiology, Research & Design - Jessica Minnier](https://jminnier-berd-r-courses.netlify.com/04-ggplot/04_ggplot_slides.html#1){target=_blank} - Assistant Professor of Biostatistics, OHSU

- [Data Wrangling and Visualisation in R Oxford IT Services - Justin Miller](https://justinmillar.github.io/ox-stats-r-workshop/#1){target=_blank} - Post-doc researcher with the Malaria Atlas Project

- [R Course for INDEC (Instituto Nacional de Estadistica y Census Republica Argentina)](https://github.com/pablotis/Curso_R_INDEC/blob/a6dd8eadff200ceaac13e8f8d548aed8c257f243/Clase%204/Clase_4_Presentacion.Rmd){target=_blank}

- [Derek Ogle, Author of fishR: R for fisheries analysis](https://github.com/EvaMaeRey/flipbookr/issues/17){target=_blank}
